ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 75
ygData.msgSnippet: Also if you are OK in High Pass then there is a seller there right next to a forge. Ore is available in the basement of High keep Andric d Regor Karana
ygData.messageBody:
Also if you are OK in High Pass then there is a seller there right next to a forge.
Ore is available in the basement of High keep

Andric d'Regor
Karana


> <snip>
>
> Anyone know where I can find both the needle and thimble molds, preferably
> near Freeport?
>
> _______________________________________________________________________________
> _______________________________________________________________________________
>
> Message: 2
> Date: Sun, 26 Sep 1999 04:25:18 PDT
> From: "" <imaohw@...>
> Subject: Re: Re: At what point does a smith become fully functional?
>
> needle and thimble molds are right outside of east freeport. Go out east
> freeport gate and run straight to zone. Once zoned...run straight till you
> see the inns that sell stuff...they are in one of those...good luck.
>
